body.p: The undersigned citizens of Clark County Kentucky, respectfully represent to your Excellency, that at the May Term 1860. of the Clark Circuit Court, George Goosey confessed judgment in the case for Gaming, which occured three years Since, in which he played a five cent game in each instance not for purposes of gain but simply amusement, That he is a moral good citizen, and has not since played a game of any kind, as we have been informed by his associates. The amount of the Judgment in each case was $2000 and costs, We respectfully ask that in consideration of the high character & good conduct of the said Goosey ever since the indictments was found against him, that a pardon be granted by your Excellency in each case,

John P Hukill
William Munday
James Munday
A. r. Evans
A N Burh
Thos Gaines
Geo M Jackson
S. W. J. Brock
David Brown
W. W. Storm
S H Cochran
